name: Blundstone Series 2068 Low Heel Boots - Women's
description: Combine classic Chelsea lines with Blundstone’s timeless comfort and you get the perfect style to pair with jeans and casual wear.Weather resistant leather upper.Leather lining slips on and off with ease.Removeable PORON® XRD™ impact absorbing insole.Low-profile block heel.Thermo-polyurethane sole is highly abrasion-resistant and provides exceptional traction.Pull loop for extra leverage.Round toe, medium width.These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size.
